external_games.name: Mega Man Battle Network Chrono X

name: Mega Man Battle Network Chrono X
storyline: One year has passed since Gregar and Falzar brought chaos to the Net, and Lan and Megaman have been living their lives in peace. But a new enterprise of cybercriminals calling themselves Red Infinity have emerged to drag our heroes into the fight once more. In Chrono X you'll work with friends both new and old to topple this threat, but be careful - Red Infinity is far more familiar with the Hikari brothers than they realize.
